scripts.deploy: bun run build && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.check: biome check src build.ts dev-server.ts index.ts public/sw.js
scripts.format: biome format --write src build.ts dev-server.ts index.ts public/sw.js
scripts.lint: biome lint src build.ts dev-server.ts index.ts public/sw.js
scripts.precommit: bun run format && bun run check
